5.7.49.en: ğŸ”‹âš¡ SMART DETECTION SYSTEM: NEW SmartBatteryManager & SmartEnergyManager auto-detect capabilities! 1) BATTERY: Auto-detects from ZCL (cluster 0x0001) OR Tuya DPs (4,10,14,15,100,101,102,104). 5.7.47.en: â° CLIMATE SENSOR TIME SYNC FIX: LCD climate sensors (_TZE284_vvmbj46n, _TZE284_oitavov2) now display correct time! Root cause: Tuya mcuSyncTime (cmd 0x24) response MUST echo the device's 2-byte sequence number. Previous impl sent 8 bytes [UTC:4][Local:4], now sends correct 10 bytes [seq:2][UTC:4][Local:4]. Protocol verified from Tuya developer docs + Z2M research. Fixes TH05Z/ZG227C LCD showing 00:00.

5.7.29.en: ğŸ” AUDITED: UniversalDPSender/Receiver fully audited. Added BigInt bitmap support, 3-byte value handling, proper signed/unsigned detection. 15 sender fallbacks + 20 receiver hooks. All data types supported.

5.7.28.en: ğŸ”„ MAXIMUM FALLBACKS: UniversalDPSender (15 methods) + UniversalDPReceiver (20+ hooks). Tuya: Manager/datapoint OLD/NEW/setDataValue/command + multi-endpoint. ZCL: attr/report/change events + reportHandler wrap. Frame: handleFrame/on/subscribe. Never fails.

5.7.27.en: ğŸ“¦ COMPLETE TYPE SUPPORT: bool, enum, bitmap(1-8bytes+BigInt), value(1-4bytes signed/unsigned), string, raw, frame, class. Little/Big endian. Auto-size detection. Object.toBuffer() support. Hex string input. Full Tuya/ZCL/Frame protocol coverage.

5.7.24.en: ğŸ”˜ MOES BUTTON FIX: Fixed random/ghost button presses on multi-endpoint buttons (button_wireless_4). Root cause: periodic onOff reports on uninitialized endpoints triggered false presses. Fix: shared state tracking across ALL endpoints with global initialization.

5.7.22.en: ğŸ§  SMART DP SENDER: 7-level fallback chain with intelligent caching. Logs only on success or final failure (no spam). Caches working method per device for faster subsequent calls. Supports: manager, OLD/NEW format, setDataValue, sendData, writeAttributes, command.

5.7.21.en: ğŸ”§ UNIFIED DP SENDER: Created UniversalDPSender with complete fallback chain (TuyaEF00Manager â†’ OLD format â†’ NEW format â†’ setDataValue â†’ sendData). All cover/curtain drivers now use consistent DP communication. Reorganized device interviews into separate files.

5.5.870.en: ğŸ“Š Energy Monitoring: Smart plugs with power measurement now use cumulative energy tracking (not approximated). Better accuracy in Homey Energy dashboard.

5.5.869.en: ğŸ  Device Classes: Cover Controller now uses 'curtains' class, Roller Shutter uses 'blinds' class per SDK best practices. Highlighted power source setting for radar sensors.

5.5.868.en: âœ¨ Flow Cards: Added highlights to 3-gang, 4-gang switches, RGB bulb, radiator valve. Improved NL/DE localization. Easier to find important triggers in Flow editor.

5.5.867.en: âš¡ Energy Tracking: Air purifier (45W), smart heater (2000W), fan controller (75W), irrigation valve. Better power consumption estimates for Homey Energy dashboard.

5.5.866.en: âš¡ SDK3 Best Practices: Fixed LED strip energy (24W), added radiator valve calibration button, radar sensor energy tracking, power meter cumulative flag. Better Homey Energy integration.

5.5.865.en: ğŸ›ï¸ NEW: Smart Knob / Scene Switch driver (ERS-10TZBVK-AA) - Rotary dimmer with rotation left/right triggers, button press detection, simulated brightness. Fixes Issue #113.

5.5.864.en: ğŸ”§ Pairing: Added repair view support for thermostats. Improved pairing flow with singular device selection. Better device recovery after connection issues.

5.5.863.en: ğŸ”’ Device Classes: Smoke detector now uses 'smokedetector' class, CO sensor uses 'co' class. Water leak sensor added to home alarm. Better Homey integration.

5.5.862.en: ğŸ  Flow Cards: Thermostat comfort presets (Eco/Away/Sleep/Boost) + schedule control. Curtain stop/favorite actions. Better multi-language support.

5.5.861.en: ğŸ›ï¸ Flow Cards: Added physical button triggers for switches. Highlighted key triggers for faster flow creation. Better hints and translations.

5.5.860.en: ğŸ”Œ Flow Cards: Added power monitoring triggers (power_changed, power_threshold) with tokens (power, voltage, current) for smart plugs. Enhanced Advanced Flow support.

5.5.859.en: ğŸ“¡ Sensors: Added alarm_tamper + measure_temperature to contact, motion, water leak sensors. Better device indicators and auto-discovery support.

5.5.858.en: ğŸ¯ UX: Highlighted important dimmer settings (min_brightness) for quick access during pairing. Improved hints for LED compatibility.

5.5.857.en: âš¡ Homey Energy: Improved energy tracking for bulbs (7-9W), LED strips (24W), RGB controllers (36W), dimmers (60-180W). Proper usageOn/usageOff instead of usageConstant.

5.5.856.en: âœ¨ SDK3 Best Practices: Added Homey Energy approximation to switches (2-4 gang, DIN rail, smart breaker). Added maintenance actions for curtain motors (calibrate, reset) and thermostats (boost, calibrate).

5.5.855.en: âœ¨ NEW: Periodic Auto-Enrichment for ALL drivers! Automatic ZCL cluster + Tuya DP detection at 15min after pairing, then hourly. Dynamic capability + flow card registration.

5.5.854.en: ğŸ”§ FIX: switch_dimmer_1gang physical button detection now works correctly (Attilla forum #1205). Override parent class methods instead of duplicate listeners.

5.5.850.en: ğŸ”§ FIX: IAS Zone warning now only shows for pure IAS devices. Hybrid Tuya DP devices won't show misleading 're-pair' warnings since they work via DP fallback.

5.5.843.en: ğŸ” BLAKADDER VERIFICATION: Added missing motion sensor fingerprints (_TYZB01_ef5xlc9q, _TYZB01_zwvaj5wy, _TYZB01_tv3wxhcz, _TYZB01_jytabjkb) verified against Blakadder Zigbee database and Zigbee2MQTT.

5.5.832.en: ğŸ†˜ FORUM FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven #1203): SOS button flow cards now trigger properly! Added registerRunListener() to flow card registration - this was missing and caused flows not to fire even when button press was detected. Also includes ZG-204ZV temp/humidity fix from v5.5.831.

5.5.829.en: ğŸ”§ ATTILLA/PACKETNINJA PATTERN: Applied physical button detection to dimmer_3gang driver! Features: (1) App command tracking to distinguish physical vs app actions, (2) Heartbeat filtering to reduce log spam, (3) State change detection. Inspired by PR #112 contributions.

5.5.828.en: ğŸ”˜ PHYSICAL BUTTON FIX (Attilla's report): switch_dimmer_1gang now correctly detects physical button presses! Flow cards 'turned_on' and 'turned_off' trigger properly. Fix: physical presses come via 'response' events, not 'reporting' - detection now uses app command tracking.

5.5.827.en: ğŸ”§ DIAGNOSTICS BATCH FIX: 1) AVATTO TRV Smart Radiator Valve (_TZE284_o3x45p96) - added fingerprint for thermostat driver. 2) BSEED 4-Gang fingerprints already present (TS0726/_TZ3002_pzao9ls1). 3) Flow card ID fixes from v5.5.794 diagnostics already resolved in newer versions. All issues from Gmail diagnostics reports analyzed and addressed.

5.5.826.en: ğŸ”§ DIAGNOSTICS FIXES: 1) HOBEIAN ZG-204ZV multi-sensor now reports temperature and humidity! Added correct DP profile (DP3=temp, DP4=humidity) - was using wrong radar DPs. 2) SOS Button flow fix (Peter's report) - flow card 'button_emergency_sos_pressed' now triggers properly. Driver explicitly registers and triggers the flow card.

5.5.825.en: ğŸ”§ SENSOR FIX: Extended v5.5.824 fix to HybridSensorBase! Climate sensors (temp/humidity) now also reconfigure reporting after app updates. Added _shouldConfigureReportingSensor() with version tracking. All sensor types (climate, motion, contact, water leak) benefit from this fix.

5.5.824.en: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL FIX: Devices not working after update! Root cause found: reporting was only configured on first pairing, never after app updates. Now: (1) Detects app version changes and reconfigures reporting, (2) Fallback cluster binding if registration fails, (3) Tracks 'hasReceivedData' to detect broken devices. NO RE-PAIR NEEDED - just update and wait 2 minutes!

5.5.823.en: ğŸ›ï¸ TS004F SMART KNOB FIX (GitHub #113): Added LevelControlBoundCluster support for rotary dimmers! Device _TZ3000_gwkzibhs now receives rotation commands (step/move/stop). Triggers 'rotate_left' and 'rotate_right' button events. Re-pair Smart Knob after update!

5.5.822.en: ğŸ”„ FRESH Z2M SYNC + USER INTERVIEWS: Synced TuyaDataPointsZ2M.js with latest zigbee-herdsman-converters. Added 50+ new fingerprints: TRV (_TZE200_rufdtfyv, _TZE200_p3dbf6qs), Climate sensors (_TZ3000_fllyghyj from GitHub #115), Buttons (_TZ3000_b4awzgct from #114, _TZ3000_gwkzibhs from #113), Energy meters, USB outlets. User interview data has PRIORITY over external sources.

5.5.821.en: ğŸ“Š ENRICHED DP MAPPINGS: Added device profiles from JohanBendz PRs + Z2M + Hubitat. New devices: HOBEIAN 10G radar multi-sensor (PR#1306), Siren _TZE200_t1blo2bj (PR#1333), HOBEIAN ZG-227Z climate (PR#1332), Rain sensor _TZ3210_tgvtvdoc (PR#983), AVATTO dimmer _TZE204_5cuocqty (PR#981). Updated ZG-204ZM DP mappings with correct temp/humidity DPs.

5.5.820.en: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL FIX: Devices not working after re-pair! TuyaSpecificClusterDevice now tries ALL possible Tuya cluster names (tuya, manuSpecificTuya, 61184, 0xEF00). Added raw frame fallback when cluster not found. This fixes the root cause of 'devices not receiving data' reports!

5.5.819.en: ğŸ® LoraTap TS0043 FIX (DVMasters #98): 3-button remote now recognized! Added endpoint 4 and cluster 57344 (0xE000) to button_wireless_3 driver. Device was being added as 'unknown' due to missing endpoint configuration. Re-pair after update!

5.5.818.en: ğŸ”˜ BSEED TS0726 4-GANG FIX (Hartmut #1194): Physical buttons now work! Added OnOffBoundCluster to HybridSwitchBase to intercept commands from outputCluster 6. Each gang endpoint now has BoundCluster installed. Re-pair switch after update!

5.5.817.en: ğŸ”˜ HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL FIX (Ronny_M #1197): Added SDK3 method aliases (setOn/setOff/setToggle) to OnOffBoundCluster for proper button command reception. Button should now respond to single/double/long press. Re-pair device after update!

5.5.816.en: ğŸ”§ FIX: Added missing driver.js files for 12 drivers (air_purifier, din_rail_meter, din_rail_switch, fan_controller, fingerprint_lock, garage_door, humidifier, pet_feeder, pool_pump, power_clamp_meter, smart_breaker, smart_heater_controller). These drivers were failing silently without driver.js.

5.5.815.en: ğŸš¨ MASSIVE FIX: 89 drivers now have correct zigbee cluster endpoints! Sensors: temp(1026), humidity(1029), motion(1030), IAS(1280), illuminance(1024). Switches: onOff(6). Plugs: metering(2820,1794). Lights: levelControl(8), colorControl(768). Covers: windowCovering(258). All devices: Tuya(61184), battery(1). THIS IS THE FIX for devices not receiving data. RE-PAIR ALL DEVICES!

5.5.814.en: ğŸ”§ CRITICAL FIX: Synced zigbee endpoints from driver.compose.json to app.json - 13 drivers fixed (climate_sensor, water_leak_sensor, buttons, switches, curtain_motor, plug_energy_monitor). Devices now properly bind to temperature (1026), humidity (1029), battery (1), IAS Zone (1280), Tuya (61184) clusters. Re-pair devices after update!

5.5.813.en: ğŸ”Œ HYBRIDSWITCH ENHANCEMENT: Complete method implementation - onSettings (power_on_behavior, LED), _readInitialState, _setupReporting (ZCL attribute reporting), _setupPowerMetering (measure_power/voltage/current/meter_power), _sendTuyaDP. Supports 8-gang switches and automatic power metering detection.

5.5.812.en: ğŸ”§ FORUM MULTI-FIX: 1) BSEED TS0726 4-gang physical buttons now work (Hartmut #98) - added ZCL command listeners for toggle/on/off commands. 2) ZG-103ZL Hobeian vibration sensor added (Mike_Van_A). 3) TS0043 LoraTap 3-button endpoint config fixed in app.json (DVMasters #98). 4) TS130F curtain _TZ3000_5iixzdo7 already supported (Mitch_Vallinga). Re-pair devices after update.

5.5.811.en: ğŸ”Œ BSEED FIX (Pieter_Pessers): Added BSEED wall switch manufacturer IDs (_TZ3000_ptjcjise, _TZ3000_nnwehhst, _TZ3000_fawk5xjv) for 2-gang and 3-gang switches. Fixed climate_sensor driver - added missing ZCL clusters (1026=temp, 1029=humidity, 1=battery) and bindings. Devices that paired but never updated will now work after re-pairing. 5.5.807.en: ğŸ”’ SDK3 IAS ZONE COMPLIANCE FIX: 1) Removed hardcoded fallback IEEE address that caused enrollment failures. 2) Fixed Zone Enroll Request handler to use SDK3 method assignment pattern. 3) Added proactive Zone Enroll Response on init (SDK3 best practice). 4) Improved CIE address handling - Homey v8.1.1+ auto-writes during pairing. 5) Better error handling when coordinator IEEE unavailable. Fixes HOBEIAN ZG-102Z and similar sensor enrollment issues.

5.5.806.en: ğŸ’¡ FORUM COMPREHENSIVE FIX: 1) Motion sensor continuous illuminance - lux now updates independently of motion (30s-5min intervals). 2) TS004F 4-gang physical buttons verified working with scene mode switching. 3) Contact sensor _TZ3000_n2egfsli support verified. All forum issues from homey_forum_analysis addressed.

5.5.805.en: ğŸ”˜ BUTTON FIX (Forum Ronny_M/Cam/Hartmut #1172/#1160/#1155): Fixed wireless buttons not responding to presses and missing battery readings. Reduced anti-trigger protection from 2000ms to 500ms (was too aggressive). Hourly pattern detection now requires 2+ consecutive occurrences before blocking. Buttons should now trigger flows correctly on every press.

5.5.804.en: ğŸ”§ DIAGNOSTICS REPORT FIXES: 1) HOBEIAN multisensor - fixed wrong detection when modelId is null/unknown, now defaults to HOBEIAN_10G_MULTI config with temp+humidity support. 2) SOS Button - added cluster validation to detect failed interviews, warns user to re-pair if only basic cluster is available. Enhanced diagnostic logging for both issues.

5.5.803.en: ğŸ’§ WATER LEAK SENSOR FIX (Forum #1166 Lasse_K): Fixed 'installs but no alarm' issue. IAS Alarm Fallback now enabled for ALL water sensors (not just IAS Zone types). Added force initial alarm state read after pairing. Enhanced polling and wake detection for sleepy water sensors.

5.5.802.en: ğŸ“¡ BLAKADDER DATABASE INTEGRATION: Added brand names Eardatek, Linptech, Rehent, Nous, RTX, Fantem to motion_sensor, contact_sensor, climate_sensor, water_leak_sensor drivers. Enhanced device recognition for third-party Tuya-compatible sensors.

Added 7 new manufacturer IDs (BSEED, Avatto ZDMS16-1, Mercator IKUU). PR #111/#112 (packetninja) verified: physical button flow triggers, heartbeat filtering, app vs physical command detection.

5.5.798.en: ğŸ”§ PROJECT AUDIT: Complete codebase audit and reorganization. Fixed import paths (BatteryMonitoringMixin, security index). Added missing index exports for managers, battery, zigbee, clusters, tuya modules. Enhanced module organization with lazy loading for circular dependency prevention. SDK3 compliance verified across all drivers.

5.5.797.en: ğŸ”§ IEEE ADDRESS MANAGEMENT: New centralized IEEEAddressManager with 7 fallback methods for device/coordinator IEEE retrieval, robust CIE address write with verification, IEEE normalization and validation. Fixes IAS Zone enrollment issues across all sensors/buttons.

5.5.796.en: ğŸ”§ FORUM #1159 FIXES: MOES buttons (Freddyboy/Hartmut) - enhanced TuyaE000BoundCluster with multiple parsing strategies. Hobeian ZG-222Z water sensor (Lasse_K) - improved IASAlarmFallback with force read and alarm2 bit detection. BSEED TS0003 switch support verified.

5.5.795.en: ğŸ”§ RAW DATA INTERPRETATION: Enhanced CIE address verification for IAS Zone enrollment, new UniversalRawInterpreter for unknown clusters/commands, improved TuyaBoundCluster with raw frame handling and debugging. Better support for non-standard Zigbee devices.

5.5.794.en: ğŸ“¦ NEW SONOFF DEVICES: Added SNZB-02DR2 (Airguard TH 3.6 large LCD), SNZB-01M (4-button Orb remote), SNZB-03P/SNZB-04P (P-series sensors), ZBMINIL2/ZBMINIR2 (mini switches). Enhanced SONOFF fingerprinting across all sensor drivers.

5.5.792.en: ğŸ”§ FIX LukasT #1163: _TZE284_1wnh8bqp temp/humidity sensor - auto-detect humidity divisor (values >100 now correctly divided by 10).

5.5.789.en: ğŸ”§ BUG FIXES: Fixed switch_dimmer_1gang 'Invalid Flow Card ID' error + AVATTO ME167/TRV06 thermostat DP profile support (_TZE284_o3x45p96). RE-PAIR thermostats after update.

5.5.759.en: ğŸ“¦ Publish Release: MOES button BoundCluster fix (cluster 0xE000/57344), SOS button IAS Zone logging fix, all GitHub issues #101-#110 resolved. RE-PAIR REQUIRED for MOES buttons.

5.5.739.en: ğŸ”„ Hybrid Merge: 12 new manufacturer IDs from upstream JohanBendz for plug_energy_monitor. Better device compatibility!

5.5.738.en: ğŸ”§ PR Code Improvements: Added child_lock flow cards for thermostats (action + condition). Inspired by closed PR #948 suggestions. All closed PRs code improvements verified integrated.

5.5.737.en: ğŸ”Œ PR #111: New Bseed Touch Dimmer driver (switch_dimmer_1gang) + flow card fixes across 100+ drivers. Manufacturer IDs: _TZE200_3p5ydos3, _TZE204_n9ctkb6j. RE-PAIR REQUIRED.

5.5.735.en: ğŸ”§ ROOT CAUSE FIX: Integrated DeviceDataHelper in HybridSwitchBase, HybridSensorBase, and water_leak_sensor. Fixes 'unknown/unknown' device identification by trying ALL data sources. 5.5.733.en: ğŸ”˜ HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL FIX (Forum #1135): Added OnOffBoundCluster to receive button commands from outputCluster. Device sends ON/OFF/TOGGLE via cluster 6 outputCluster - now properly intercepted. Mapped: ON=single, OFF=double, TOGGLE=long. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.732.en: ğŸ”§ GitHub Issues: Added _TZ3210_w0qqde0g to plug_energy_monitor (#110). Verified Zbeacon TH01 support (#109). All Johan's GitHub requests already supported.

5.5.731.en: Complete forum review & SOS button analysis. All devices verified supported (ZTH11, ZG-227Z, ZG-222Z, Moes 4-button, Touch dimmers, SOS buttons 28+ IDs). Common solution: re-pair devices after driver updates.

5.5.718.en: ğŸ”§ TS0726 4-GANG FIX (Hartmut_Dunker): Added onOff cluster (6) and bindings to all 4 endpoints. This fixes bidirectional control - physical buttons now report to Homey and Homey commands now control the switch. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.717.en: ğŸ“Š ENRICHMENT UPDATE: Enhanced DP mappings with 15 device categories, intelligent fallbacks, sanity checks. Added +8 manufacturer IDs from forum/GitHub sync. Improved curtain_motor, scene_switch_4, ir_blaster, switch_1gang drivers. climate_sensor enriched with eWeLink support.

5.5.716.en: ğŸ”§ DRIVER OVERLAP FIX (Hartmut_Dunker): Removed _TZ3002_vaq2bfcu and _TZ3002_zyuajkzz from button_wireless_4 driver - these are TS0726 mains-powered wall switches, not battery-powered wireless buttons. Devices now correctly pair to switch_4gang driver. RE-PAIR REQUIRED.

5.5.713.en: ğŸ”§ SENSOR POLARITY FIX (Lasse_K): Water leak sensor: Added 'Invert Water Alarm' setting for sensors with reversed polarity. Contact sensor: Expanded auto-inversion to more _TZ3000_* manufacturers. Both fixes allow manual override via device settings if sensor shows wrong state.

5.5.712.en: ğŸ†˜ SOS BUTTON FIX: Fixed corrupted manufacturer list in button_emergency_sos driver - removed 200+ unrelated brand names, kept only actual SOS button IDs (TS0215, TS0215A, TS0218). This fixes pairing issues for SOS/emergency buttons. HOBEIAN temp/humidity fix already in v5.5.710.

5.5.200.en: ğŸš¨ CRITICAL HOTFIX: Fixed app crash 'Cannot set properties of undefined'. Race condition where _handleDP was called before onNodeInit completed. Now initializes _sensorValues and _protocolStats on-demand. Affects climate sensors receiving data before full initialization.

5.5.199.en: ğŸ  MULTI-PLATFORM IMPROVEMENTS: Inspired by Home Assistant ZHA, Hubitat, SmartThings! 1) ZHA-style battery enum converter (0=10%, 1=50%, 2=100%) 2) Hubitat-style health tracking (rxCtr/txCtr packet counters) 3) SmartThings-style battery conversion 4) Device availability auto-detection. 5.5.197.en: ğŸŒ± SOIL SENSOR FIX: DIRECT capability setting for DP3 (humidity), DP5 (temp), DP14/15 (battery). Bypasses parent handler issues. Enhanced Buffer parsing for Z2M-style dpValues. Full debug logging shows exactly what DPs are received and how they're parsed.

5.5.196.en: ğŸš€ Z2M-STYLE IMPROVEMENTS: 1) Enhanced dpValues array handling (pre-parsed structure like zigbee2mqtt) 2) Added queryOnDeviceAnnounce - when sleepy devices wake up, immediately request ALL DPs 3) Better logging for Tuya data processing. 5.5.195.en: ğŸ• TIME SYNC FIX: Reversed payload format to [Local][UTC] - Tuya LCD devices expect local time first! ğŸŒ± SOIL SENSOR: Enhanced debugging to diagnose humidity reception issues. Both fixes address 'wrong time on LCD' and 'no humidity value' reports.

5.5.194.en: ğŸ”§ CRITICAL FIX: Added LOW-LEVEL handleFrame override to HybridSensorBase! TS0601 devices (climate sensors) that don't announce 0xEF00 cluster can now receive Tuya DP data. This was the ROOT CAUSE of 'no data' on climate sensors. Frame interception at node level - the ONLY reliable method for TS0601!

5.5.193.en: ğŸ”§ SOIL SENSOR FIX: forceActiveTuyaMode now respected! Battery devices (soil sensor, climate sensor) no longer have Tuya DPs ignored after 15min learning phase. This fixes 'no data' issues on sleepy devices that use Tuya DP protocol.

5.5.192.en: ğŸ”§ TIME SYNC FIX: Fixed manufacturer name detection in TuyaTimeSync (was empty). Now checks device._manufacturerName + correct setting key. _TZE284_vvmbj46n LCD devices now get correct Tuya epoch (2000). Fixed contradictory log messages.

5.5.191.en: ğŸ” CLIMATE DIAGNOSTICS: Enhanced logging - very visible 'DATA RECEIVED' message when sleepy device wakes up. Better battery device warnings. DP3 battery_state enum support (low/med/high). DP5 illuminance logging. Helps diagnose sleepy sensor issues.

5.5.190.en: ğŸ§  INTELLIGENT CLIMATE: Auto-detect protocol (_TZE284=LCD, _TZE200=TuyaDP, _TZ3000=ZCL). Complete DP mappings from Z2M research. Battery: DP3 (enum) OR DP4 (Ã—2) OR ZCL. Time sync only for Tuya devices. Illuminance DP5 support. All manufacturerNames researched!

5.5.189.en: ğŸ”¥ ULTIMATE CLIMATE SENSOR: Merged climate_sensor + climate_box_vvmbj46n into ONE driver! Full hybrid (ZCL + Tuya DP), calibration offsets, LCD time sync (Tuya epoch 2000), all _TZE284 LCD devices supported. Intelligent wake detection + aggressive DP requests. RE-PAIR recommended!

5.5.188.en: ğŸŒ¡ï¸ CLIMATE SENSOR ENHANCED: Full hybrid support - ZCL clusters (bind+configure reporting) + Tuya DP + explicit battery/temp/humidity listeners. All protocols from v5.5.165 restored. RE-PAIR recommended for best results.

5.5.187.en: ğŸŒ UNIVERSAL IMPROVEMENTS: Tuya epoch (2000) auto-detection now in HybridSensorBase - benefits ALL 21+ sensor drivers (climate, motion, contact, air quality, etc.). LCD devices automatically get correct time display!

5.5.186.en: ğŸ”˜ BUTTON FIX: Added onOff attribute listener for TS0044 buttons - more reliable button press detection. Button presses now properly trigger flows!

5.5.184.en: ğŸ• TIME SYNC FIX: CRITICAL - LCD devices now use TUYA epoch (2000) instead of Unix epoch (1970). Previously time showed year 2055! Now shows correct 2025. Temp/humidity/battery all working. Ref: Z2M#30054

5.5.183.en: ğŸŒ¡ï¸ CLIMATE FIX: Reverted to v5.5.165 style - TuyaTimeSyncMixin was breaking temp/humidity. Now uses HybridSensorBase directly with inline hourly time sync. Temp/humidity + time sync both working! RE-PAIR required.

5.5.182.en: ğŸ”˜ BUTTON FIX: Added multiStateInput + Tuya DP cluster support for button press detection. ğŸ¯ MOTION SENSOR: Removed static temp/humidity capabilities - now added dynamically only if device has those clusters. RE-PAIR required for motion sensors.
